appDescription.message: Bidirectional URL switching and redirection between related websites

noMatchesFound.message: No matching redirect rules for this URL
noMatchesFound.description: Text shown when no redirect matches are found

reloadRequired.message: Language changed. Reload extension to apply changes?
reloadRequired.description: Message shown when language is changed and reload is needed

languageChangeInstructions.message: Note: To change the extension's display language, you need to change your browser's language settings. This language preference has been saved for reference only.
languageChangeInstructions.description: Instructions for changing the display language in Chrome

languagePreference.message: Language Preference (browser settings control actual display)

browserSettings.message: To change display language, go to Chrome Settings > Languages

ruleNameRequired.description: Error message when rule name is missing

bothDomainsRequired.message: Both source domain and target domain are required
bothDomainsRequired.description: Error message when domains are missing

bothPatternsRequired.message: Both source pattern and target pattern are required
bothPatternsRequired.description: Error message when patterns are missing

invalidRegexPattern.message: Source pattern is not a valid regular expression
invalidRegexPattern.description: Error message when regex pattern is invalid

groupReferenceExceedsCount.message: Reference $1 exceeds the number of capture groups in the source pattern
groupReferenceExceedsCount.description: Error message when group reference exceeds count

advancedModePatternRequired.message: Complete regular expression patterns are required in advanced mode
advancedModePatternRequired.description: Error message when advanced mode patterns are missing

confirmConvertToAdvanced.description: Confirmation message for converting to advanced mode

willGeneratePatterns.message: The following regex patterns will be generated

advancedRuleCannotUseSimpleMode.message: This rule uses advanced regex and cannot be edited in simple mode
advancedRuleCannotUseSimpleMode.description: Message when advanced rule can't use simple mode

priorityDescription.message: Priority determines the order of rule matching. When multiple rules match the same URL, the rule with higher priority will be used.

fromDomain.description: From domain label in simple rule form

toDomain.description: To domain label in simple rule form

ruleNamePlaceholderAdvanced.description: Placeholder for rule name input in advanced mode

regexCaptureGroupHint.message: Use regular expression capture groups () to capture parts of the URL for use in the target URL

regexReferenceHint.message: Use $1, $2, etc. to reference capture groups from the source pattern

regexReferenceExampleExplanation.message: will use the path from the source URL
